name: Emergency Car Driving Simulator
description:
In Emergency Car Driving Simulator, every second is important! As you get your special training and experience, gear up to save some lives in the city as you don the hat of an Emergency Officer!

Drive to rescue, as you go forward in this driving game while keeping your eyes glued to the objective.

Play in 3 different modes – Training Ground, Missions, and Special Ops!

1-Training Ground: Train extensively in the city by driving a Fire Truck, Ambulance, Police Car and S.W.A.T Car.

2-Missions: Complete the missions in time and graduate to becoming an Emergency Car Driving specialist!

3-Special Ops: There has been an accident in the middle of the road? Or there is a medical emergency at the restaurant? Take on your duty as an emergency officer and save your city. Do you drive the Ambulance, Fire Truck, Police Car or the S.W.A.T. Car? It depends entirely on the mission in hand.

In this high adrenaline game, you will experience the thrill and adventure of saving lives, as you drive along a beautiful city.

Download Emergency Car Driving Simulator @Games2Win from the Apple App Store and let the fun begin!

Emergency Car Driving Simulator Features:
- 3 different modes – Training Ground, Missions, Special Ops
- Over 50 thrilling levels
- Complete missions in time to save your city
- Drive the Fire Truck, Ambulance, Police Car & S.W.A.T. Car
- Realistic driving mechanics
- 3 Different camera views

Games2Win is a fun company that believes in creating amazing and enjoyable games for all ages. We have over 800+ proprietary games that are available both online and on mobile.
